definition: water/river/liquid/beverage/additional charges or income/(of clothes) classifier for number of washes

sentences.english: China water conservancy is changing from engineering style to resource style.
sentences.chinese: 中国水利正由工程型向资源型转变。

sentences.english: Wang Shunsheng and his visiting members visited several water conservancy project sites to learn about the progress of the on-going construction.
sentences.chinese: 王顺生一行先后去到多个水利工程现场了解建设情况。

sentences.english: Dalong Water Control Project is a key project in Hainan Province.
sentences.chinese: 大隆水利枢纽工程是海南省的重点工程。

sentences.english: The river basin administrative organ subordinated to the Ministry of Water Resources undertakes the hydrologic industrial administrative work as empowered by the Ministry.
sentences.chinese: 水利部所属流域机构承担部授权的水文行业管理工作。

sentences.english: Former minister of Ministry of Water Resources Zhang Zhenhuai praises the school as "the cradle of Yellow River technical leaders".
sentences.chinese: 水利部原部长杨振怀赞誉学院为“黄河技干摇篮”。

sentences.english: Electric power step-up substation is the important corollary engineering of Baise hydropower station.
sentences.chinese: 百色水利枢纽升压站是电站工程的重要配套工程。

sentences.english: This reporter learned yesterday from Beijing bureau.
sentences.chinese: 这是记者昨天从北京市水利局了解到的。

sentences.english: The group of research on harnessing the trade bribe, MWR.
sentences.chinese: 水利部治理商业贿赂课题研究组。

sentences.english: We will put great effort into water conservancy, and comprehensively strengthen agricultural and rural infrastructure.
sentences.chinese: 大兴水利，全面加强农业农村基础设施建设。

sentences.english: Seepage exists widely in earth-rockfill dams in water conservancy projects.
sentences.chinese: 在水利工程中，渗流广泛存在于土石坝之中。

sentences.english: The Three Gorges Dam is the largest water conservancy project in Yangtze Vally.
sentences.chinese: 三峡大坝是长江流域最大的水利工程。

sentences.english: For Wanjiazhai Yellow River Water Control Project and the location of the project leader.
sentences.chinese: 为万家寨水利枢纽工程和引黄工程龙头所在地。

sentences.english: The Daguangba project is the largest hydro project in Hainan Province.
sentences.chinese: 大广坝水利水电枢纽是海南省最大的水电工程。

sentences.english: Governments in many countries spend large amounts of resources on irrigation.
sentences.chinese: 许多国家的政府在水利化方面花费了大量资金。

sentences.english: Water regulation or control by storage capacities is often one of the main water resource problems.
sentences.chinese: 水库的水量调节，是开发水利资源的重要问题之一。

sentences.english: The water department in this area provides people with sufficient water.
sentences.chinese: 该地区的水利部门给人民提供足够的水。

definition: river conservancy works (dike maintenance, dredging etc)/river conservancy worker
to pilot a ship/to channel water/to draw water (for irrigation)
